name: Kids Math Game
tagline: Html5 / css3 / javascript / angularjs Kids Math Game
body:
### Welcome to Kids Math Game
This is a Demo Game created by Html5 / Css3 / Javascript / angularJs. 
With this game kids will test their addition, subtraction, multiplication and division skills.

#### This is a demo version of the game so it only contains small number of questions.

Before Testing this game in your browser you should run this code into terminal
```
   ` $ cd /kidsMathGame_folder`
    `$ npm install`
    `$ bower install`
```
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
